short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revision Buddy helps you use AI to adapt web content to various reading styles!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Note**: This Chrome extension DOES NOT work in Europe.

Revision Buddy, the flagship Chrome extension from CuprBot Labs Inc., revolutionizes web browsing by intelligently adapting online content to users' preferences. This AI-driven tool transforms text into user-specified formats, from concise summaries to easily digestible explanations.

Key Features:
• Customisable AI "Personas": Users can create and save multiple writing styles.
• Dynamic Content Transformation: Instantly rewrites web content to match chosen personas.
• Interactive Learning: Enables users to ask follow-up questions for deeper engagement.
